text: Twilight Comes Twice is a children's book of free verse written by Ralph Fletcher with pictures drawn by Kate Kiesler. It was first published in 1997, and describes the changes from night to day and from day to night. ==References== * * ==Other websites== *Ralph Fletcher's website Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher Category:1997 books Category:20th-century American poems
title: Twilight Comes Twice
